pageTitle: RX100 ISO High Sensitivity SCN mode: Sony Cyber-shot Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   feedback form Sony RX100 Sam Can anyone confirm that this setting is taking and merging as specified?  Thanks. According to the SONY pdf and Gary Friedman's ebook, this setting is supposed to take six shots and merge them, rejecting any that are blurred.  My RX100 only takes one shot and in a test of a slow-moving ceiling fan, it's blurred.  All the other low-light "motion-blurring" settings . If you believe there are incorrect tags, please send us this post using our
